snippet: The upstate town is so far having trouble finding a buyer for the 4,800-seat arena, which it cannot afford to keep running.
abstract: No buyers show up to bid for 4,800-seat civic center that city of Glens Falls, NY, is trying to sell; Glens Falls Mayor Jack Diamond says city simply cannot afford to operate arena.
lead_paragraph: The upstate town is so far having trouble finding a buyer for the 4,800-seat arena, which it cannot afford to keep running.

headline.main: Glens Falls, N.Y., Finds No Bidders as It Tries to Auction Off Civic Center
headline.print_headline: Upstate Town Tries to Sell Its Arena (No Takers Yet)
